amendment.description: Amendment strikes sections 131 through 133 of the bill which would have allowed funding to foreign nongovernmental organizations that perform or promote abortions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 107-62 to strike sections 131 through 133 of the bill in order to effect preservation of the President's legal authority to implement the pro-life "Mexico-City Policy" which prohibits U.S. population assistance funds from being made available to foreign organizations that perform or actively promote abortions in foreign countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hyde amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 210 (Roll no. 115).
